choices.question: A vector is ...
answers:
a fixed-sized list of numbers.

a table structure.

a type of artificial neuron.

choices.question: Neural machine translation systems learn vector-based representations of words in the training corpus. These representations are known as ...
If two words have very similar word embeddings, this suggests that:
answers:
They appear with very similar co-texts in the training corpus. 

They are good translations of each other.

They are synonyms.
